passage: "Ngenxa yokuxhumana kwekhebuli enemicu yokudlulisa ukukhaya ehamba ngaphansi kolwandle nesiphuphutheki sokuxhumanisa, i-Greenland uxhumene kahle nabantu abangu-93% abanoxhumano lwe-inthanethi. Abahlali bendabuko baseGreenland bazibiza ngokuthi Inuit eCanada nokuthi Kalaalleq (ubuningi Kalaallit), umuntu waseGreenland, eGreenland. Ubugebengu kanye nokuphatha kabi abakwamanye amazwe ngokujwayelekile, kuyinto engaziwa e-Greenland. Uma uvakashela iZwe Eliluhlaza ngenkathi ebandayo (ngokubona ukuthi uma uya enyakatho nakakhulu, kuya kubanda), kubalulekile ukuphatha okokugqoka okufudumele ngokwanele. Izinsuku ezinde kakhulu ehlobo zingaholela ezinkingeni zokulala ngokwanele futhi zihlotshaniswa nezinkinga zempilo. Phakathi nehlobo, qaphela omiyane base-Nordic. Ngenyanga efanayo indiza idlule lapho umgwaqo wezindiza uphelela khona eMashhad futhi yashayisa udonga, ibulala abayishumi nesikhombisa.
question: Ikuphi okulandelayo izindiza ezibe nengozi okulimelee abantu kakhulu?
answer_list: Indiza iphahlazeke endleleni eza e-Armenia esuka e-Iran
Indiza iphahlazeke endleleni eza e- esuka Irane esuka e-Iran
reasoning: Kuphasishiwe ukuthi indiza yamaphoyisa enophephela emhlane ibulale abathathu futhi yalimaza abathathu. Ezinye izingozi zabalula kuphela inani labashonile (168 no-17) ngaphandle kokukhuluma ngabalimele. Ngakho-ke leyo yenophephela emhlane iyona elimele abantu kakhulu (abalimele abathathu).

passage: AbaseBhabhiloni bakhela izithixo zabo ngazinye ithempeli eliyinhloko elalibhekwa njengekhaya lesithixo. Abantu abaletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu nakubaphristi bazozama ukunika onkulunkulu izidingo zabo ngemigidi nemikhosi. Ithempeli ngalinye lalinegceke elivulekile lethempeli kanye nendawo engcwele ephakathi lapho kwakungena khona umphristi kuphela. Ngezinye izikhathi imibhoshongo ekhethekile engunxa-ntathu, ebizwa ngokuthi ama-ziggurat, yayakhiwe ukuze ibe ingxenye yamathempeli. Isiqongo sombhoshongo kwakuyindawo engcwele ekhethekile yesithixo.
question: Ikuphi okulandelayo kwanzelwa ngokuqondile amapristi?
reasoning: Umbhalo uthi ithempeli lalinendawo engcwele ephakathi “lapho kwakungena khona umphristi kuphela,” okusho ukuthi le ndawo yayisebenziswa ngokuqondile ngamapristi. Imikhosi nemicimbi zenziwa ngabantu, kanti i-ziggurat ingukwakhiwa, hhayi umsebenzi oqondile wophristi.

passage: Ukuguquka kungaba namathonya ahlukile angafani kuye ngohlobo lokuguquka, ukubaluleka kocezu lwesakhi sofuzo oluthintekile kanye nokuthi amangqamuzana athintekile amangqamuzana esidoda neqanda yini. question: Ngokuya kolwazi olunikeze yilesi sigaba, ukuhlukahlukana nemiphumela kwezakhi zofuzo azincikanga kuphi?
reasoning: Ngokombhalo, imiphumela yokuguquka incike ohlotsheni lokuguquka, kubaluleka kocezu lwesakhi sofuzo oluthintekile, nokuthi amaseli athintekile awobulili (isidoda/iqanda) yini. Akukho okushiwo ngobungakanani (okungakanani) be-genetic material ethintekile, ngakho yilokho okungancikile khona.
